description.value:
Replacement Power: You gain Intimidate as a class skill; this replaces the Glory domain’s increased save DC to resist channel positive energy.

Replacement Domain Spells:

  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.uv3bvuerhe0furhu]{Hollow Heroism}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.nyafit6oz90jqakn]{Hollow Heroism, Greater}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{Overwhelming Presence}.
  • If you are evil, replace the domain spells @Compendium[pf1.spells.hl9l92qfalq6c55z]{Bless Weapon} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{Holy Aura} with @Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{Aid} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{Unholy Aura} respectively.
